On: set photographs from the film Creed II showing Stallone in a sickly state were mistakenly taken as evidence of his battle with prostate cancer.
The claim was spread via a clickbait web: 4. News stories and ongoing projects involving Stallone, such as his participation in the upcoming Rocky series spinoff sequel Creed II and the production of Rambo 5, indicated that he was alive and actively working, contradicting the claim of his passing.
